level.heading: Punishment.
level.text: ยง 20-681 Punishment. (a) Any person who shall violate any of the provisions of this subchapter shall be liable to forfeit and pay a civil penalty in the sum of not more than one hundred dollars for each violation. (b) Any person who shall violate any of the provisions of this subchapter shall be guilty of an offense and punishable by a fine of not less than twenty-five dollars nor more than two hundred fifty dollars, for each offense, or by imprisonment for not more than thirty (30) days, or both.
